snippets.code:
# Multi-environment deployment configuration
environments:
  development: &dev_config
    database_host: "dev-db.studio.com"
    api_endpoint: "https://dev-api.studio.com"
    cache_enabled: false
    debug_mode: true
    
  staging:
    <<: *dev_config
    database_host: "stage-db.studio.com"
    api_endpoint: "https://stage-api.studio.com"
    debug_mode: false
    
  production:
    <<: *dev_config
    database_host: "prod-db.studio.com"
    api_endpoint: "https://api.studio.com"
    cache_enabled: true
    debug_mode: false
    ssl_required: true
snippets.title: Environment Configuration with Anchors
snippets.description: Advanced YAML features with anchors and references
